Reviews.Title: Galaxy Ace Plus GT-S7500
Reviews.Author: Paul C
Reviews.Content: This product is all it is advertised.  I received it from Amazon prior to the expected arrival date in new condition.  It was in an unlocked condition so I can use it on any GSM network.  This is my first Android smartphone and so far it does everything I desire from a cellphone.  The screen resolution is good and the screen size, while only 3.65 inches is adequate for doing Emails and online websites. The phone size is perfect, not too big and not too small.  The 1Ghz processor speed is very fast also compared to the Nokia C6 I had before.  Samsung did an automatic update of the software (2.3 Gingerbread) the first time I went to their website.Calls are clear and texting is ok, though somewhat slow due to the small size of the screen and my large hands. I got spoiled using the slideout keyboard on the Nokia (unfortunately it broke after 18 months).  The 5mp camera takes great pictures.  A great phone and I highly recommend it for the price ($240) and quality.

Reviews.Title: ion
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A good entry level factory unlock smart phone. Works well in Europe and USA with any carrier that use GSM.

Reviews.Title: Great Android Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Esteban Ch.
Reviews.Content: Package included: Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus Cell Phone (International Version - Unlocked), White Earphones, Mini-USB to USB Cable and Quick Start Guides (English & Spanish).This is my second smartphone (also bought in Amazon) and it's working fine with Movistar's network EDGE/3G (Ecuador, South America). Definitely, Android is an upgrade over the Blackberry OS.PROS: I'm pleased so far with: Android OS, 1Ghz Processor, 3GB Internal Storage, 5.0 MP Camera and Google Play Store.I'm really satisfied with the Google's sync capabilities. I use a couple gmail accounts and I browse with Google Chrome in my PC, so I can sync everything on the cloud (e-mail, calendar, contacts, documents, maps, etc). In other words,  I can access  my info anywhere and anytime.CONS: I think the antenna signal could have a better reception. maybe it's the 3G network... Samsung's accesories build quality feel kind of cheap compared to Blackberry accesories. Also, I couldn't find enough accesories in Ecuador, you better buy those in Amazon.I fully recommend this seller (BLUTEKUSA). They delivered it as advertised and fast ;)

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Miguel Rojas
Reviews.Content: The phone is in perfect condition, works very well for the company Movistar Venezuela. All functions are working well. The only problem I've seen is the battery as it discharges very fast even when not in use by any application. For the rest, I am very fascinated with the cell

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Miguel Osers
Reviews.Content: i like this telephone very much if you want an inexpensive smartphone able to make calls, store some photos and connect to the internet. its not an iphone, its not a gallaxy sIII but also its not the same price. the relation what you pay and what you get is excelent. The only problem being the lack of accesories like covers and protectors

Reviews.Title: Excelent product.
Reviews.Author: Alberto G.
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent phone. With very good features. I really am very pleased with my purchase and the seller is responsible and reliable. I recommend it 100%

Reviews.Title: From Venezuela: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Jorgeny
Reviews.Content: Great product, exactly as described. Users from Venezuela, It works perfect with Movilnet and Movistar. If you want it for Digitel, it won't work on 3G. Great phone, I absolutely love iit!!

Reviews.Title: do not buy this phone does not work on 3g!
Reviews.Author: rafabike
Reviews.Content: The description says HSDPA 850/1900 is not so in reality it is 850/2100 in my country Venezuela no operator works with that frequency for 3g!

Reviews.Title: Samsung GT-S7500 Galaxy Ace Plus
Reviews.Author: Mildred
Reviews.Content: The cell met my expectations, the only thing is that in my country (Venezuela), not connected on 3G with data from the operator, and thus loses its benefits and its technology, the rest of the Samsung GT-S7500 Galaxy Ace Plus . I like the interface, its screen size. The affordable price for those who can not spend beyond, by one more advanced, the conclusion fulfills everything you want from a smartphone

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus
Reviews.Author: Luis Espina
Reviews.Content: Excelente equipo, cumplió todas mis expectativas, era lo que yo deseaba. muy buen teléfono, lo recomiendo. Primera compra y estoy muy satisfecho

Reviews.Title: Excelent by the cost
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Is a very good Android phone by a reasonable price. If (like me) you don't need the state of art (the top technology with the last Android version, and a mini computer which make calls), this would be an excellent option of smartphone. Enough fast, a lot of apps capable, compact (some other models are so big that looks like you talk with a laptop in your ear). good hardware.The only one thing against: It comes with TIM (Italian phone carrier) boot animation and 5 not erasable TIM apps. but, what does it matter? the boot animation is changable, configure the phone with your local carrier settings is too easy, and the 5 TIM app icons...  I just ignore it. And, who knows...  maybe some day I could travel to Italy.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted at a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: NancyT2U
Reviews.Content: I wanted a cell phone that was unlocked, had smart phone abilities and was at a reasonable price.  This seemed to look good but I was  not real keen on buying it sight unseen.  It has not disappointed me at all.  There is such a wide gap between the high end phones and reasonably priced smart phones.  This phone has a very good camera, sends and recieves text messages and has clear reception.  There are many other more advanced features which I will never use.  I like the size and it is relatively sturdy.  I bought a simple protective case that snapped on easily so I don't have to worry if I drop it.  I like how the OS thinks like I do.  Not much of a learning curve.  If you want a basic, intuative smart phone at a reasonable price this is the one.  I've had it a couple of months now and have zero regrets.

Reviews.Title: Caution
Reviews.Author: Carlos Medeiros
Reviews.Content: My phone apparently took a an update that is causing it to reboot every few minutes.  Normally this would not worry me but after calling Samsung they inform me that I need to call China to get any support on this phone.I recommend caution unless you want to find yourself in the same situation.

Reviews.Title: Telefono
Reviews.Author: Belkis C. Camacho
Reviews.Content: It really is a good product, I recommend the expectations openly summit, which requires the consumer, I Facino an excellent article.

Reviews.Title: Levanta 2G
Reviews.Author: Roseline Perez R.
Reviews.Content: No levanta 3g, sino 2g y la version del telefono es para Europa H, la version no es para America latina

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: crismasini
Reviews.Content: El producto es exactamente como lo describen. Ninguna queja! Funciona perfecto en Venezuela y llegó en la fecha establecida. Muy contenta con la compra

Reviews.Title: Grateful
Reviews.Author: Sheryl
Reviews.Content: Excelent Product it works very good in Venezuela, this is in perfect conditions, but i've a Question i can't to connect wifi with it can you help me about this?

Reviews.Title: this phone does not work on 3G
Reviews.Author: Jose Guerrero
Reviews.Content: The description says HSDPA 850/1900 is not so in reality it is 850/2100 in my country (Venezuela)Is a scam.Do not buy it.Waste time and money.

Reviews.Title: International Version works in TX
Reviews.Author: Phill
Reviews.Content: Just got this international phone and I live in dallas TX, and it works fine on solavei/t-mobile service. From what I gather is, however, being an international version, it is not compatible with 3G/4G networks in the US. So it's simply a 2G phone. But when I have the wifi (at home, work and other places that provide wifi) turned on it is faster than my previous 3G LG phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent GT-S7500 cell phone for foreign travelers
Reviews.Author: Virginia buyer
Reviews.Content: The cell phone's size is fit to my style. It is not too large or too small for average people. It meets my requirements for GPS map, Browser, E-mails. It runs smootly and very good in response. It is quick in start up, has a lot of internal memory for apps. Single core 1GHz processor is pretty good for a mobile device like this.

Reviews.Title: Good choice!
Reviews.Author: Edgar
Reviews.Content: Hi! in my opinion it is a good choice for a mid level phone.... very nice size, good speed. It was a gift for a relative and so far, she is happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Problemas con las bandas
Reviews.Author: Antonio Primera
Reviews.Content: This model is s7500t and not is band 1900 /2100. The band is 850 / 2100Please change the specifications

Reviews.Title: No good for 3G with AT&T; and T-Mobile
Reviews.Author: M. Frickscavalcante "mmm"
Reviews.Content: Warning: the frequency 3G (internet) of this smartphone is 900 and 2100. AT&T; use 850 and 1900. T-Mobile uses 1700. Then, no goo for 3G  in T-Mobule ant A&T.; For talking is good in both. For internet working only in edges, but is too slow.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Asha
Reviews.Content: This phone is a nice buy, it does practically everything. The fm radio feature that it comes with is amazing

Reviews.Title: Conections problems
Reviews.Author: Alexis
Reviews.Content: No se conecta en 3g para Movistar Venezuela“ The description says HSDPA 850/1900 is not so in reality it is 850/2100 in my country Venezuela does not works with that frequency for 3g!

Reviews.Title: Good quality with excellent price I recommend it to everyone is looking for this product Thanks this will not be my first time :
Reviews.Author: Ramy Ahmed
Reviews.Content: Good quality with excellent priceI recommend it to everyone is looking for this productThanksthis will not be my first time :)

Reviews.Title: all good
Reviews.Author: luis morales
Reviews.Content: all good product came in perfect condition and at the right time and the excellent quality and a fair price

Reviews.Title: Had the phone less than 3 months and its gone bad
Reviews.Author: Mad Moo "missymaw"
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone through Amazon and the first issue is that it came with a European charger.I spoke with the seller and was promptly sent an american charger at no cost.Recently I started to really use the phone and as luck would have it, the phone is giving trouble.The screen is constantly rebooting itself over and over again.Buy at your own risk.

Reviews.Title: well
Reviews.Author: Alexis Lira
Reviews.Content: good price good product good presentation i recommend the product you can buy it several times excellent bran and you can be confident ok

Reviews.Title: made for Australia market, balky, crashed and dies
Reviews.Author: Jottawalee
Reviews.Content: bought it to use in France with local SIM card; came with Australia market presets and a lot of unwanted news feeds that I could never get rid of; keyboard is small even for my avg size hands and typing was laborious with corrections and autocorrect frustrating; used only a handful of google play-sourced apps for metro service, social media and mapping, it became very slow and was balky, even with moving most apps to micro-SD. then one day after only 3 months of use, downloading a map file, it crashed, got stuck in reboot mode and even when I did a factory reset/hard reset it would not come back to life.  feel penny wise/pound foolish, should have spent more on a newer phone w/newer android.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone for The Price
Reviews.Author: mm62
Reviews.Content: This phone does almost everything I need.  The main thing missing that I'd like to have is a front camera, but for the price it's fine. I've only had it for a couple of months, but so far it has performed perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Decent phone
Reviews.Author: judith labert
Reviews.Content: I was a little surprised at the size and it seems to not function as well as my previous Samsung phones- not sure if it is just this model. It is a nice size and not as large and clunky and it has less buttons which can be a positive for someone who likes simplicity.

Reviews.Title: it is great
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Keefer "welder1"
Reviews.Content: i LOVE THIS PRODUCT IT DOES EVERYTHING I WANTED IT TO DO AND MORE. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PHONE TO ANY ONE

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Juan Gallegos
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for use in Peru and had no problems with it whatsoever. I was worried about being able to use the SIM card on the small cell phone I bought in Lima with the Galaxy, but it transferred all the data and worked immediately.No problems with the battery, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and the reception was better than most phones I tried out in Lima.

Reviews.Title: wrong phone
Reviews.Author: Ramon Alvarez
Reviews.Content: The phone says they are selling can work with HSPA 900 not yet shipped with this feature only works with 850 so they gave me a different phone that is on the page and I can not use I had to sell it to someone else

Reviews.Title: DISAppointed bUYER
Reviews.Author: Frank Centeno
Reviews.Content: Item did not come with AC charger for North American outlets? I have no plan to go to Europe or Australia in the next 5 years to be able to use it. I don't need Telstra and other Australian apps that's loaded in it. How do I uninstall them? Other Apps I tried no longer exists.Disappointed with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Charged up and works great!
Reviews.Author: Jupiter!
Reviews.Content: The phone works super.  This was my first smart phone, and I was not familiar with the Android operating system.  When first turned on, everything was in Italian- which made me wonder how I was going to set it up.. Fortunately, I selected the gear icon and could see the language could be selected.  After selecting English, I was in business.  I had inserted a T-moble chip, and was able to get everything in operation.  I selected this phone so I could use it in Japan- haven't had a chance to use it there yet, but I don't think I'll have any problems.

Reviews.Title: Great for my purpose
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Doan "Covered Wagon"
Reviews.Content: This phone works well with Straight-Talk service.  The only problem with the operation is that the internet features and apps are European.  Support is from Samsung.UK  instead of Samsum.com.  Otherwise, it does what I need to do!

Reviews.Title: 98% satisfaction, the item arrived in time.
Reviews.Author: Rubén Graterol
Reviews.Content: The telephone's charger came working bad. This device doesn't charge the battery of my telephone, but I think that the accesories and telephone most be tested at the shop.

Reviews.Title: Awesome !
Reviews.Author: MountainMama67
Reviews.Content: My 12yr old daughter loves this item! Will probably buy 2 more if available!Works very well, nice design and lots of functions!

Reviews.Title: Works in Spain
Reviews.Author: Manuel J. Gomez
Reviews.Content: Phone is as advertised. I'm using it with a prepaid service with the carrier Vodaphone in Spain with not problems.

Reviews.Title: My girlfriend love it. Me too...
Reviews.Author: Antonios Sylvitis
Reviews.Content: Soooo cool. Easy to use, so customizable. Handy size. Especially in the hands of my girlfriend. Excellent piece of art. I seriously consider to replace my big S3 with this one. Perfect screen

Reviews.Title: Serves its need
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "ifesinachi"
Reviews.Content: This phone has everything the modern person needs in a phone. Don't have any complaints. Talk-Txt-Web!!!! it does it all. Love Samsung!!!!!

Reviews.Title: TELEFONO MUY MUY MALO
Reviews.Author: Pedro Avila
Reviews.Content: DESPUÉS QUE PASE LA MALA EXPERIENCIA DE NO RECIBIR MI PAQUETE A TIEMPO DEBIDO A QUE UN VENDEDOR YA NO DISPONÍA DE CELULARES PARA LA VENTA, AMAZON MUY GENTIL PROCEDIÓ A AYUDARME A CONSEGUIR OTRO EQUIPO, AL COMPRAR NUEVAMENTE Y RECIBIR EL PAQUETE PUDE NOTAR QUE EL TELÉFONO ES MUY LENTO, SE QUEDA BLOQUEADO Y SIN SEÑAL. A MI GUSTO MUY MALO.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone, but......................
Reviews.Author: Tash
Reviews.Content: I liked the features this phone.However within the matter of one month two weeks of using the phone it just shut off and refused to power up.

Reviews.Title: best phone
Reviews.Author: Kwame Yiadom
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my son in Ghana so l can't say too much about it but, according to him, the phone really works good for. He has not said any other thing about it.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Zoila Pontiles
Reviews.Content: Good product .the fill to input the contacts name is not large enough for me like blackberry. I like the camera

Reviews.Title: I would not recommend it
Reviews.Author: vkdim
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace the Samsung Infuse 4G that I lost. Looking at the reviews and price, it seemed like this phone would give me a similar performance as my old phone but I was wrong. I have had this phone for less than a week now but I have experienced a lot of problems already. So my carrier is AT&T; and I get full data bars when I am not using wifi however the phone will have a lot of connectivity problems when I use apps like YouTube. Sometimes the internet works, sometimes it doesn't or it takes forever to load. Twitter app just does not function at all for me on this phone. Oh by the way, this phone is loaded with a lot of useless apps. The charger that came with the phone did not work at all. I only get good internet connectivity if I am on a wifi network. Totally regret this purchase, I wish I had just bought another Samsung Infuse instead seriously.

Reviews.Title: Billing problems
Reviews.Author: ENDRINA HENRIQUEZ
Reviews.Content: the billing is fine, but it was my credit card for an amount greater.and report them inconvenient and I have not been solved yet. Buyers Beware!

Reviews.Title: Great Cell phone for USA and Overseas use
Reviews.Author: N. Rao "HB DVD reveiwer"
Reviews.Content: This cell phone has been used to replace my Tmobile Motorola Razr phone and for overseas use in India. The transfer to Tmobile was transparent . Although I do not have a data plan, I was able to use my home wifi and other free wifi without any difficulty. Because of the quad band, I do not see any problem overseas using the local SIM . This product is from Australia, hence has Australian services -news, sports etc. I love many of the apps that comes with the phone.I would strongly recommend this to everybody  looking for a quad band cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone.
Reviews.Author: fernando montano
Reviews.Content: The purchase was great and the phone samsung is excellent and friendly.The seller was trustable and the product fullfilled my expectations

Reviews.Title: Not as per the expectation
Reviews.Author: Partha Protim Pal
Reviews.Content: Once I switch on the phone, what I found inside that:one wall paper written in bengali (Indian) languagesome vodaphone (subscriber of indian mobile) software is already installed into this mobileeverytime i am switching on and switching off, the vodaphone logo is coming

Reviews.Title: product review
Reviews.Author: Kwame Asamoa
Reviews.Content: beautiful product with necessary features that meets my needs.It works very well with the internet and easy to handle.

Reviews.Title: Masterpiece
Reviews.Author: Gregorina L. Son
Reviews.Content: Very great item, reasonable shipping rate. Speedy delivery. Although this item was for my daughter, I can say that she is very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: naimar mota
Reviews.Content: Bellissimo my phone is really more than I expected something great, beautiful, charming and exquisite  and it is super fast

Reviews.Title: Good phone...for the price
Reviews.Author: DLC
Reviews.Content: For the price it is a good smart phone.I wasn't expecting it to process like lighting nor was I expecting it to hold a ton of memory. Which was good because it does neither. What it does do is provide the basic features you'd expect of an android phone for a good price.The bummer is all the spam ware that comes with it. Mine apparently is from Australia and the default news, weather and sports all comes from the Land Down Under. There is no way to delete the firm ware from the phone so you just have to live with it.Other than that I have had it for seven months and have enjoyed its functionality and size. I use it mostly for texting, checking email and news. I tried playing a game on it and found it to be utterly unsuited for that.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Erika Adriana Contreras Torres
Reviews.Content: I just loved the cellphone, it's easy to manage and it has a lot of apps tha are very useful. I would totally recomend it!!!

Reviews.Title: sales specifications does not match the team sent
Reviews.Author: M. Mota
Reviews.Content: When receive telephone box I could see that there was a label above the details the original specifications of the phone. However, I expected the phone correspond with what is offered by the seller. when I verified that it was not what I had bought, I applied for refund of the purchase and so far no one has contacted me to see the details of this problem ...The amazon customer service should review these cases and immediate response ... with this type of sellers that offer features of a product and send us another, we are losing credibility in the online shopping system.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Suniaga
Reviews.Content: I recommend it. It's exactly what I need. Small and lightweight. Good pictures, good sound, great graphics and fast. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Worth its price
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Mancilla "Leoman07"
Reviews.Content: This is an accesible, very nice looking piece of equipment. Considering the price I paid for it, I would say that it is excellent. Capabilities are not great, but enough to get by for a person of my use level.

Reviews.Title: Samsung GT-S7500 Galaxy Ace Plus - Unlocked Phone - International Version -...
Reviews.Author: Marcial Mota R
Reviews.Content: So far so good...device is doing ok as of today. It is not an amazing android based dellphone--you get what you pay for ....

Reviews.Title: Puntualidad
Reviews.Author: Cesar Saavedra
Reviews.Content: El telefono llego en el tiempo estimado a venezuela! Buen funcionamiento, pantalla grande con un tamaño muy compacto, lo recomiendo!

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Ysrael Fernando
Reviews.Content: The phone is very well developed, brings no defects and is excellent, the only detail is that it works with the frequencies for 3G on 850/2100 and in Venezuela telephony operators do not use these frequencies, therefore not recommended frequencies that are posted are not the same that brings the phone, but as I said before this is the only detail that brought the team the rest of its features are perfect ...El telefono esta muy bien elaborado, no trae defectos y es excelente, el unico detalle es que trabaja con las frecuencias para 3G en 850/2100 y en Venezuela las operadoras de telefonia no usan estas frecuencias, por este motivo no se recomienda, las frecuencias que estan publicadas no son las misma que trae el telefono, pero como dije antes este es el unico detalle que trajo el equipo el resto de sus funciones estan perfectas...

Reviews.Title: goodnigt
Reviews.Author: maria urbina
Reviews.Content: please need goodnight Product invoice if possible send me via email. thanksbuenas noches necesito que me envien via email la factura de la compra, gracias

Reviews.Title: recibido
Reviews.Author: jose miguel bermudez
Reviews.Content: no he tenido ningun problema hasta ahora , llego a ala fecha que se esperaba, y todo muy bien muchas gracias....

Reviews.Title: Buen Envio
Reviews.Author: Diego Lara Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Funciona sin problema. Bueno, llego sin problemas a venezuela. o o o o o o o o o o o

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: MILEIDY
Reviews.Content: el producto llego en excelente condiciones tal cual lo pedi, todo el tiempo fui informada de donde se encontraba. Gracias

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Drizella ChacÃ³n
Reviews.Content: Muy feliz con mi cel, tengo lo que necesito, es liviano practico. Muy contenta, excelente la camara. Con los juegos corre sin problema. Maravilloso

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: denisse cristina martinez
Reviews.Content: very Good Product.... I love my new cellphone its so amazing and very usefull. met my expectations by now p

Reviews.Title: A waste of money!
Reviews.Author: Diego
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and 2 or 3 weeks after the software damage, so I had to pay extra money to skilled people to recover the cell phone, the repair was very expensive and the worst is that its a NEW PHONE. I consider unfair.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Carlos Villarroel
Reviews.Content: This Mobile is excelente Equipment, there to arrive aren't problem, sorry for my english, i'm begining to learn, my calification is very very good

Reviews.Title: RATING REVIEW.
Reviews.Author: oldman
Reviews.Content: New as advertised, and very prompt delivery. The phone works perfectly well, the only downside was the fact that the manual was in Spanish and not English.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Danny Carpenter
Reviews.Content: This is my second one (the other was stolen en Venezuela at gunpoint), and I love it.  Works great on the network here, and is all i need in a phone.  Highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Excelent product!
Reviews.Author: Kenny Manuel Quijada Lisboa "kquijada"
Reviews.Content: Muy buen producto! Me pareció muy buena compra. Llegó bien a mis manos y fue lo que esperaba comprar. Gracias.

Reviews.Title: Really good phone
Reviews.Author: marmalade7
Reviews.Content: So far, so good with this phone.  I've had it for a couple of weeks and it's done everything I've asked it to.  It took a little getting used to but I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Honest mobile
Reviews.Author: LUIS ARATO
Reviews.Content: Galaxy Ace Plus is a great option, low cost, works well, and do anything you want. I recommend Ace PLus.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Ace
Reviews.Author: Lidia
Reviews.Content: I got the cellphone in excellent conditions. I have not regrets about it.. Only the details about the phone should be change, because it says that the phone was from german but is made in china. Beside that the cellphone is working great.. excellent bought

Reviews.Title: katherine garcia
Reviews.Author: katherine garcia
Reviews.Content: esta super pavo el articulo me encanta, super economico , perfecto para mi gusto , eficiente, rapido y el vendedor lo recomiendo mi articulo como lo pedi

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: A really good cellphone.. You can do whatever you want with this kind of cellphone.. Android is the best OS and Samsung the best brand

Reviews.Title: I am loving it as a new android user & developer
Reviews.Author: RAJIB
Reviews.Content: Compare to the price the device is a perfect android device. It does let you do everything you would like to do in a smart phone. And the droid is fast enough to make you happy. If there was a front facing camera it would have been magical but look at the price. It won't allow you to get one with the price at least not today. Quality of the product is great. I would recommend the device for smart phone users.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Fidel Chacin
Reviews.Content: cumple con lo indicado, funciona perfectamente, lo recomiendo 100 % buen equipo.gracias a ustedes cumplieron con la ventaExcelente

Reviews.Title: i love the phone
Reviews.Author: eben armah
Reviews.Content: it is one odf the best phone and i ll always recommend it to people.it has alot of functions.great phone

Reviews.Title: Product Good but seller not good
Reviews.Author: hi
Reviews.Content: Product was not the same "dark blue" they have mentioned. It was black. I had no option but to use it coz I had to gift it to my aunt in India. I had to fly the after it arrived. It did arrive at the estimated time.

Reviews.Title: Price was unbeatable!
Reviews.Author: D. Powell
Reviews.Content: Decided to switch from BB to Android and the Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus was well recommended from the reviews I read for the budget I was working with. HassleFreeCell had it new & unlocked for what may have been a Black Friday special price, and it was delivered way before the estimated date. The specs on this device as well as the fact that Samsung has it on the list to be upgradable to the Ice Cream Sandwich OS sealed my decision (it comes with the Gingerbread OS). The size is just right, the display and audio are great for videos/movies/music, and not having a hard keyboard on my smartphone isn't as bad as I thought, having being used to Blackberrys for the past 5 years. I'm definitely happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Gisela Carmona
Reviews.Content: Muy satisfecha con el producto. Era lo que esperaba a la hora de comprar. Gracias por la atención prestada en la compra y el envío

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: BEATRIZ AMORIM
Reviews.Content: MIt worth each penny invested!!  I am in love with this cell, and was a great acquisition!!!!!!!!!  I strongly recommend to buy this product!

Reviews.Title: I can't use it !!
Reviews.Author: Roxana Siu
Reviews.Content: I bought this "unlocked phone - international" thinking that I can use it in my country Peru. I was wrong. I didn't know that 3g phones needed certain band width to work. OK, it is my fault for not cheking the specs. But as an average user, I didn't know that  3g hdsm 900/2100 band is not compatible with 850/1900 band in Peru. Now know it, too late........ I have spent $ 220 for a phone that can be used with voice and 2g...... not 3g. A waste of money

Reviews.Title: BAD Description Bands 3G
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis Reyes Coronel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this smarphone, believing in what he says the product description says it has 3G Network HSDPA bands 850/1900MHz, which is my surprise to receive the package, this versiion, the S7500 brings 3G bands 900/2100 Mhz :-(.I had to buy another line, with another operator to use the smarphone, this product is poorly exposed in the description.

Reviews.Title: thelephone was used. Not new product
Reviews.Author: Rosendo A.
Reviews.Content: battery charger not ok. is not charging.I bought a new charger to charge the phoneAdvertisement calls for new thelephone

Reviews.Title: Good product but...
Reviews.Author: M. Sandoval "Mariandre"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice phone with great features. The only problem I have is that at times I stop receiving calls and texts. When I realize it, I try to make a phone call but the phone shows me a message saying "mobile network not available". When that happens, I have to turn it off and turn it back on so I start receiving calls and texts again.

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Good phone, bought it for my father. Speed is ok. Most important: quad-band, has wifi, radio tuner, and has spanish language! For my dad is good enough!

Reviews.Title: This unlocked cell phone was a failure never take 3G or HSDPA 900 / 2100 only HHz was compatible with GSM. Company Telefónica an
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Offerman "JUANCHI"
Reviews.Content: This unlocked cell phone was a failure never take 3G or HSDPA 900 / 2100 only HHz was compatible with GSM. Company Telefónica and Samsung told me what an Assembly phone and you don't have original parts. The others; Camera 5MP, 2592 x 1944 pixels with autofocus and LED flash; GPS, MP3/MP4 players; Document editor; Image editor; Google applications; Calendar; Picasa integration and predictive text (Swype).3,65 "TFT capacitive touch screen, 320 x 480 pixels;" 3GB of internal storage, 512MB of RAM; everything works less the band 3G that I don't take at any time. Dreadful investment.

Reviews.Title: Beshowy
Reviews.Author: Beshowy
Reviews.Content: Now it 'a doesn't work will and it's so slow, but I don't liked because it's so bad and boring.

Reviews.Title: It works fine in Paraguay!
Reviews.Author: Paulino Aguayo Rojas
Reviews.Content: Good buy! I bought this for one person who is very satisfied. The phone does everything it's supposed to do. The only bad thing is the battery drains very fast.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: ramon trujillo
Reviews.Content: excellent phone except that in Venezuela this series stands on 3G but not as you browse the bands are not supported here in Venezuela Other duties if it is faster

Reviews.Title: Wireless Everything ,they cheated me!!!
Reviews.Author: Hernandez La Cruz Eloy "The Men!"
Reviews.Content: wireless everything sent a mobile version with Australian 3G bands at 2100/850, which does not work in Venezuela, in article description they said so it works at 3G bands at 1900/850 but it does not that. I really annoying!

Reviews.Title: useless
Reviews.Author: albert paez
Reviews.Content: was not the product offered is an imitation that does not connect to the internet. only serves as a paperweight

Reviews.Title: GREGORY RUIZ
Reviews.Author: GREGORY GER RUIZ HERNANDEZ
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent phone in this new version of ace plus. Users can have the basic functions and anytime internet, mail, android apps, gps very important. All it takes is the front camera to use some communication applications. I recommend it

Reviews.Title: Llego en perfectas condiciones....
Reviews.Author: CESAR RENDON
Reviews.Content: Buena compra, todo ok, el producto llego en perfectas condiciones. este móvil cumple con las necesidades básicas de un usuario de gama media. Recomendado

Reviews.Title: My Samsung Galaxy Ace
Reviews.Author: TK Review
Reviews.Content: I had to get used to the touch screen but now that I can use it, I like the idea of just sliding my fingers across the screen and lightly touching to get where I want to go ont he phone.

Reviews.Title: Return of Samsung phone.
Reviews.Author: Barbara Glynn
Reviews.Content: Not able to get local provider to provide service due to phone being foreign. Very disappointed that not able to use this phone.

Reviews.Title: it was supposed to be unlocked
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: This phone was apparently manufactured for Telstra in Australia, and they must have locked down a bunch of functionality.  I tried to set this phone up for use in Israel, and there was no way to update for Hebrew support.  Also, was absolutely unable to upgrade from Gingerbread to Jellybean OS.  Do not buy if you want to use this with another language outside of the US.

Reviews.Title: Me gusta
Reviews.Author: Jose Solis
Reviews.Content: Excelente teléfono es muy rápido y de buena calidad, solo que con algunas operadoras en mi país no levanta 3G ni HSDPA solo 2G.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Mayvette Vigil
Reviews.Content: el telefono tal cal como se muestra sin nungun problema. el envio exitoso a tiempo. toda la oeracion fue excelente

Reviews.Title: Bought for father
Reviews.Author: Rushi
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my father.He likes it very much.The phone is functioning perfectly well without any glitches

Reviews.Title: Good cell phone
Reviews.Author: Marcos D Dq
Reviews.Content: At first I was suspicious of buying this phone but when I got my hands and I tried it, I was satisfied with this international version and the fact that the bands were unlocked, the latter mostly because I really needed use this phone with the local service dealer and it met all requirements!! Delivered on time in perfect conditions... I recommend it, buy it on Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Model Number
Reviews.Author: Jeanna Benish
Reviews.Content: I am trying to register the phone but there is NO model number on the inside of the phone.The phone was supposed to be blue but it's far from that, the is black, and I can't upload music or ringtones to the phone.I've downloaded the manual but it isn't much help.How is it that a phone has no model number??

Reviews.Title: Información distinta
Reviews.Author: Cesar Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: La descripción descrita por el vendedor es distinta a la que recibí, ellos aseguran que el equipo móvil trabaja con una plataforma HSDPA 850/1900MHz para 3G la cual en la caja del equipo que trabaja con 850/2100 y la empresa que me presta el servicio móvil trabaja con 3G UMTS/HSDPA: 1900 Mhz por lo cual fue que realice la compra.Espero una pronta respuesta y modificación de las descripciones del equipo para que nuevos clientes no sean afectados:César GonzálezBarquisimeto-Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Convenience
Reviews.Author: Somjin Plengkhum
Reviews.Content: Easy to understand the functions. Plan to use it with the sim card overseas but has no chance to try yet. See how it works

Reviews.Title: exelente
Reviews.Author: Francisco Monasterio
Reviews.Content: Muy bueno responsable y oportuno, muy buena atencion y responsabilidad, no tardó en llegar el producto ,  el distribuidor responde y nunca perdimos contacto, lo recomiendo abiertamente.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Douglas Paredes
Reviews.Content: Este equipo cumplió con mis expectativas al comprarlo, la transacción fue rápida y se cumplió con el tiempo de entrega

Reviews.Title: Sirve en venezuela para movilnet¿
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: Hi, I'm from Venezuela and I wonder if this team works well here to Movilnet and Movistar. the same way that bands like to know if it really works and would arrive on February 19, 2013 at Tampas fl... sirve para movilnet aqui en venezuela?

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900MHz frequencies and 3G Network HSDPA 900/2100MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
Android 2.3 (Gingerbread); 5MP Camera, 2592x1944 pixels with autofocus and LED flash; GPS, with A-GPS Support; MP3/MP4 Player; Document editor; Image editor; Google Aplications; Calendar; Picasa integration and Predictive text input (Swype).
3.65" TFT Capacitive Touchscreen, 320x480 pixels; 3GB Internal Storage, 512MB RAM; HTML Browser, Adobe Flash; JAVA via Java MIDP emulator; Qualcomm Snapdragon S1 Chipset; 1Ghz Processor; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, DLNA, Wi-Fi hotspot and Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP.
Talk time Up to 11 h (2G) / Up to 7 h 20 min (3G)- Standby Up to Up to 670 h (2G) / Up to 420 h (3G)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung GT-S7500 Galaxy Ace Plus - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Dark Blue
